name: an-assessment-of-open-data-learning-needs-for-people-working-in-governments-around-the-world
title: An assessment of open data learning needs for people working in governments around the world
description:
This dataset contains raw responses from a survey exploring the open data learning needs of people working in governments around the world.

The survey is available here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1snjb6UcPZUhFqH8XwLuk0F1Bow0vtjfTk-LLBg97ZfA

The privacy impact assessment is here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/17wACOBIxcCD8mHZeTP-gdJKmxO5Dh29NMxq9HH7gu8Y/edit

resources.name: Open data learning needs: June 2017
resources.description: This dataset contains raw responses from a survey exploring the open data learning needs of people working in governments around the world. The data was processed in June 2017.
